snippet: Some students criticized the visit as benefiting the president more than the universities, and suggested that the meeting was little more than a photo op....

headline.main: Families Aim to Raise $15 Million to Search for Flight 370
headline.print_headline: Families Aim to Raise $15 Million to Search for Flight 370

lead_paragraph: Some students criticized the visit as benefiting the president more than the universities, and suggested that the meeting was little more than a photo op.
